meanings.definition: A spread made from vegetable oils and used as a substitute for butter.
meanings.sent1: I spread oleomargarines on my toast instead of butter.
meanings.sent2: The store sells different brands of oleomargarines.
meanings.sent3: At the picnic, the ants mistook the oleomargarines for butter and had a feast!
meanings.sent4: Her love for oleomargarines was as deep as the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The smell of freshly baked bread with oleomargarines was irresistible.
